original_text: You will know that your children will be very many. You will have as many descendants as the grass that grows in the ground. You will know that your children will be very many.
korean_text: 네 자손이 많아지며 네 후손이 땅의 풀과 같이 될 줄을 네가 알 것이라

sentences.original_text: that your children will be very many
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 자녀들이 매우 많아질 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: as many descendants as the grass
that your children will be very many
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 자녀들이 매우 많아질 것이라는 것을
